## IMeta.withMeta() method

Returns a copy of the original value with given metadata attached.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withMeta(meta: any): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  meta | <code>any</code> | meta data |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T`
